Antonio Fullone's Personal Blog.

Welcome to my personal blog. Here you can find articles about design and coding. But also suggestions about expat life, cooking recipes and travelling. All the code published on this blog is available with examples in my lab and in my online code repository on BitBucket and GitHub.

This is the personal website of Antonio Fullone, a web designer from Italy actually living in Delft, Netherlands. He loves design, coding, cooking, travelling and so on .. He would love to own a Tiger.
